body: I wanted to ask this before but forgot. Is it possible to split my emerald in two? = 2 golds? I want to have a rank on my alt akov.
body_tagged: I wanted to ask this before but forgot. Is it possible to split my emerald in two? = 2 golds? I want to have a rank on my alt akov.
title: Rank question

replies.body:
That is not possible D:
However we do allow full rank transfers! :)
replies.body_tagged:
That is not possible D:
However we do allow full rank transfers! :)

replies.body: Wat, so you can merge ranks, but you can't separate them?
replies.body_tagged: Wat, so you can merge ranks, but you can't separate them?

reply_to.body:
That is not possible D:
However we do allow full rank transfers! :)
reply_to.body_tagged:

replies.body: I was told it was possible because when I bought emerald I purchased to golds.
replies.body_tagged: I was told it was possible because when I bought emerald I purchased to golds.

reply_to.body_tagged:

replies.body:
You can merge if the donor rank is on the same account.
For example, if you bought gold on your akov account, and gold on 99250 I don't think we would be able to merge it...

If you bought two golds on 99250 then we can merge!
It's for security reasons.
